title: FS 1949 Bill McGowan postcard PSA 1.5 - SOLD
author: bxb

posts.post_title: FS 1949 Bill McGowan postcard PSA 1.5 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/222577941307?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]

Postcard is dated 1949.  Very clean front, downgraded due to back.
Nice -- not in the right spot so you might not find your buyer.

Actually, it's in the postcard thread, so it's in the right spot.

I have one with a 1951 date.  I didn't realize there were variations.  I guess this one is his rookie!
